Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class NoTagByteBufferChunkKeyValue

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ByteBufferExtendedCell
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ByteBufferKeyValue
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.NoTagsByteBufferKeyValue
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.NoTagByteBufferChunkKeyValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cell, ExtendedCell, HeapSize, RawCell
@Private public class NoTagByteBufferChunkKeyValue extends NoTagsByteBufferKeyValue
ByteBuffer based cell which has the chunkid at the 0th offset and with no tags
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getChunkId

      public int getChunkId()
      Description copied from interface: ExtendedCell
      Extracts the id of the backing bytebuffer of this cell if it was obtained from fixed sized chunks as in case of MemstoreLAB
      Returns:
      the chunk id if the cell is backed by fixed sized Chunks, else return ExtendedCell.CELL_NOT_BASED_ON_CHUNK; i.e. -1.
